zh.title: 世界卫生组织宣布天花病毒被根除
大韩航空858号班机爆炸事件
联合国安理会通过第678号决议，授权对伊拉克动武
德国联邦议院通过《基因技术法》
比尔·盖茨发布《未来之路》一书，预测互联网时代
安吉拉·默克尔就任德国首位女总理
联合国大会通过决议，承认巴勒斯坦为观察员国
古巴革命领袖菲德尔·卡斯特罗逝世

en.title: Bill Gates used the name "Microsoft" for the first time.
United Nations Convention on Law of the Sea adopted.
Wayne Gretzky scores his 500th NHL goal.
Gulf War: UN Security Council authorizes use of force if Iraq doesn't withdraw from Kuwait.
Elias James Corey wins Nobel Prize in Chemistry.
George Harrison, lead guitarist of The Beatles, dies.
The United Nations Climate Change Conference begins in Cancun.
Chapecoense plane crash in Colombia kills 71 people.
Barbados becomes a parliamentary republic, replacing Queen Elizabeth as head of state.
